[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/slider-ffpf_optimized.jpg” background_position=”center_right” custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”15%||10%|” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Abel|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”70px” header_line_height=”1.1em” text_orientation=”center” header_font_size_tablet=”60px” header_font_size_phone=”50px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ header_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0.2em” header_text_shadow_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Freedom from
Poverty Foundation
–
Under maintenance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii=”|0px|0px|0px|0px” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|3%||3%” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|8%||8%” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_2_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Breaking the poverty cycle

of the most disadvantaged

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|3%||3%” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|8%||8%” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

With your help, we will save lives.

The Freedom from Poverty Foundation is a non-profit foundation working in the community of Jamkhed, located in Maharashtra, India, to break the cycle of poverty in families through surgical, educational and community-based missions. Each dollar raised is used to improve the quality of life of the population in this region and to help them become independent, in the short, medium and long term.

Our work is possible due to a large group of dedicated volunteers from Canada, Europe and around the world comprised of doctors, nurses, occupational therapists, public health professionals, accountants, students and various other fields of activity. These passionate and dedicated individuals volunteer their services and use their skills to help the foundation reach its objective of “breaking the poverty cycle of the most disadvantaged”.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”25px|0px|0px|0px” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#6d6f71″ custom_padding=”6%||6%|” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/icon-1.png” align=”right” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”|0px||” custom_padding=”|0px|10%|25%” always_center_on_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||5%|” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Donate

We need your help!
let’s help the needy to lead a self-dependent life
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.ffpf.org/donate/” button_text=”Donate now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/icon-2.png” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”|||0px” custom_padding=”10%|25%||0px” always_center_on_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|6%||6%” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_2_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”||20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

News

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blog fullwidth=”off” posts_number=”2″ meta_date=”j F Y” show_author=”off” show_date=”off” show_categories=”off” masonry_tile_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#6d6f71″ body_text_color=”#6d6f71″ meta_text_color=”#6d6f71″ pagination_text_color=”#ed1c24″ text_orientation=”left” custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_featured_image=”padding-left:20px;” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blog][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
